mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberId, memberPassword, memberName, memberEmail, memberTel, memberSex) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberTel}, #{memberSex})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberId=#{memberId} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
mapper.update: update member_table set memberEmail=#{memberEmail}, memberTel=#{memberTel} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from member_table order by manage_id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
